page.title: 03Leisure in Cropwell Bishop
page.content: {The Hunt:}At Christmas a Hunt takes place at the Wheatsheaf Pub with Tom Barlow's horses- the Prince Of Wales has joined in with the Hunt before.{ {Cropwell Bishop Youth Club:}is held by May Johnson. Sometimes they play Rounders at the Memorial Hall field, sometimes they go swimming etc. Youth Club is for young people. {Bingo:}Bingo is on Monday nights at the Memorial Hall. It is mostly for { Old Age Pensioners but other people go as well. The numbers are shouted out by Edwin Musgrove who lives at 98 Hoe View Road. Mr.Musgrove is also Caretaker of the Hall. {School Fetes:}About twice a year we have Fetes at our school, there are { Tombolas, Plant Stalls etc. we sometimes have Jumble Sales as well. {By: Clair Tinkley.
